message.body: Hey lovely, I got your email and I am in the same boat. Working with the space between/within alone and not alone. Going with the flow sounds good. I am going to the reiki school at noon today for chanting the name of Ganesh, silent sitting, and them disc
I am off to coop shift soooo...not done til 1
Aw. See you at yoga then!
Hey lovely, tomorrow at 9am is Align and Flow, not Forrest. If that makes a difference. xoxo
That's fine! I like Morgan's classes....
You should come then!!! If you're feeling it in the morning.
I think i just may. It was great to be in a class!!!!
And an amazing 2013 to us both! Much love and appreciation.... going to chant now...for us...the planet...our hearts!
Perfect. I'm listening to Krishna Das and am going to draw and write now.
